alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Griggs (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:40PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Griggs and northwestern Barnes Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hannaford, or 31 miles north of Valley City, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hannaford around 645 PM CDT. Walum around 655 PM CDT. Dazey around 705 PM CDT. Rogers around 725 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
